You will die here, too.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="BookReader" node_id="2073086" parent_e2node="2073085" author_user="Auspice">The ribs of a seagull and the eastern view</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Chras4" node_id="1217888" parent_e2node="1217885" author_user="junkpile">Around nine PM my heart was breaking so I went to bed early to listen to it happen.</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
